title: Trimming
medium:
Medium: metal, silk
Technique: bobbin lace
description: Silk lace of soft rose color in scallop design, with silver gilt threads outlining parts of the design. Scallops tipped with narrow edge of yellow-green silk and inner border outlined with soft blue silk.
